title: Which of the following statements about anonymous functions in PHP are NOT true? (Choose 2)

choices.a: Anonymous functions can be bound to objects
choices.b: Anonymous functions created within object context are always bound to that object
choices.c: Assigning closure to a property of an object binds it to that object
choices.d: Methods bind() and bindTo() of the Closure object provide means to create closures with different binding and scope
choices.e: Binding defines the value of $this and the scope for a closure
